Package changepaneshape

Class IsoscelesTrapezoidTabbedPaneUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.TabbedPaneUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTabbedPaneUI
          • changepaneshape.IsoscelesTrapezoidTabbedPaneUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class IsoscelesTrapezoidTabbedPaneUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTabbedPaneUI
    The class below changes the size of the tabs from rectangle to trapezoid and also lets the user to change the color of the test used within the tabs.
    Author:
    Java Swing Tips This code was taken form https://java-swing-tips.blogspot.com/2017/01/change-tab-shape-of-jtabbedpane-to.html
